claimOwnership().details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

addFactProviderToWhitelist(address).notice: Allows owner to add fact provider to whitelist.

isAllowedFactProvider(address).notice: Returns true when the given address is an allowed fact provider.

isFactProviderInWhitelist(address).notice: Returns true if fact provider is added to the whitelist.

isWhitelistOnlyPermissionSet().notice: Returns true when a whitelist of fact providers is enabled.

removeFactProviderFromWhitelist(address).notice: Allows owner to remove fact provider from whitelist.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

setWhitelistOnlyPermission(bool).notice: Enables or disables the use of a whitelist of fact providers.
